fields.customfield_17182: Redo Feature Security Impact Analysis if necessary
fields.description:
Description:
Runtime's code to be modified by adding trace generation code in critical methods inside product code, for UHM
Basic Support of B2B cloud in e2e monitoring( Only entry/ exit tracing. No payload & log capture)

Business Value:
Complete E2E tracing of business flow for customers

Requestor:
PM

iWiki Link for More Details:
https://iwiki.eur.ad.sag/display/RNDWMSIQA/CLTF-636%3A+Basic+Support+of+B2B+cloud+in+e2e+monitoring
fields.summary: [VD][B2B-CLOUD-Phase1] Support of B2B cloud in e2e monitoring
fields.customfield_14280:
-E2E agent for b2b cloud should be implemented
-Access mechanism for UHM app from B2B app needs to be established
-Transaction detailed logs of e2e trace in b2b should be linked from UHM
-All defined and planned B2B - API GW Cloud - IC use cases should be supported in UHM E2E flow

Rationale:
